title: Mini-Ep 139: Forever Whatever Butts & Stuff
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 139: Forever Whatever Butts & Stuff
itunes:subtitle: Kate becomes her own facialist for a day and Doree celebrates Rosh Hashanah! Then listeners call in about Shabbat practices, uneven boobs, and scalp care for those with no hair. Plus a listener shares a soothing activity of the day.Activity of the D...
description:
Kate becomes her own facialist for a day and Doree celebrates Rosh Hashanah! Then listeners call in about Shabbat practices, uneven boobs, and scalp care for those with no hair. Plus a listener shares a soothing activity of the day.


Activity of the Day: Listen to Lego Builders Journey: Original Game Soundtrack


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

THRIVE MARKET -  Join today at thrivemarket.com/forever35 and you’ll get a FREE gift of your choosing, up to 22 dollars in value.

VOGUE - Visit vogue.com/FOREVER35 for your one-year subscription of Vogue for just twelve dollars, PLUS a free tote bag!

PROSE - Get a FREE consultation and 20% off your first order today! Go to Prose.com/forever35. 

SIGNATURE HARDWARE - Visit signaturehardware.com/FOREVER35 to find your style today.

MOLEKULE - For 10% off your first order, visit molekule.com and enter FOREVER35 at checkout.

MASTERCLASS - Visit masterclass.com/forever35 for 15% off the Annual All-Access Pass.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
